subject: Week 1: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
It is often said that the internet has reduced privacy and increased cybercrime, but some believe its benefits, such as convenience and communication, outweigh these risks. To what extent do you agree or disagree with these views?

First spend 8 minutes writing an outline which should include your main position, 2 reasons for holding this position, specific examples to support these two points. 

Reply to this post and share your outline. 

Then pair up and discuss with your partner the strength and weakness of your outline relative to them. Reply to a student's post to discuss the strengths and weaknesses of both outlines. 

Please do not paste any screenshots.

subject: Re: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
My opinion:The benefits of the internet is outweigh its risks.

Reason1 :Internet could provide enormous way to help us solve problems.
Example1 :The AI tools and research engine.

Reasons2:Internet can break the barriers of time and space.
Example2:WeChat and video call help us connect with others.

The way to reduce the ricks rate:Be careful when talking to strangers online.
Save your own passwords.

Overall:there are some reasons to prove my position and some methods provided to reduce the risks rate

subject: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
My opinion is that the Internet’s benefits overweight its disadvantages.

  Firstly,the convience of Internet is so important in the modern society people couldn’t live comfortably without it.It’s necessarity proves that the benefits of Internet is crucial.
  Secondly,although there are many increasing cybercrime,people are trying to overcome it by using some laws and technology.So its disadvantage could be solved.

subject: Re: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
Option :I agree with this idea that the benefit of internet overweigh its risk.
Reason 1: internet can meet the modern society needs . 
Eg:cross-border trade\contact with friends or families abroad
Reason 2: the risk that had been mentioned can be prevented.
Eg :some laws have been enacted

subject: Re: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
My opinion is the advantages outweigh the disadvantages.
1.Science and technology are No.1 productive forces.Internet is a advanced tool to make the progress of human.
2.Internet has a close link with life,includes finance,society,community,culture.So,it has a special meaning to our life.
3.Internet make our life more convenient.
4.As a new technology,it has some problems that need us to solve or find,it is common.

subject: Re: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
From my perspective, the issue of cybercrime and individuals' privacy from the internet has been put into spotlights, and that is what the government cares more about in our daily basis. In this sense, the internet has more safety risks than its benefits for human beings nowadays.

Reason1: Mortals who are in elder ages are easier to be the targets from online scammers, and that complicates their daily mobile using since they have to pay attention to scammers all the time instead of just chilling on online shopping apps or communicate with families or friends through internet.

Reason2: Individuals who like to post and make friends through internet have the most percentage of being scammed or stealed personal privacy.

subject: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
I think the internet is useful for us

There are two main reasons

First，we can find the knowledge easily.The resources allows us to access knowledge in lots of ways.

Second,the internet provides us more diverse entertainment.It gives me a mood boost.

subject: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
I am agree with a part of the viewpoint  "internet is benefit"，and both agree with a part of another viewpoint "internet is harmful".

on the one hand，internet can help us to search various information conveniently,instead to cost a long period of time search in so many different places.And internet can also bring us more joy,when you are feeling tired or upset,you can communicate with some AI tools like Deepseek or Doubao

On the other hand,internet can also bring some negative influences.For example,someone use internet to cheat others,and some websites may also leak your personal privacy.

So the Internet has two side,how to use Internet properly,it's the key.

subject: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
Attitude: I largely agree that the benefits of the internet outweigh its associated risks.


Reason 1: The internet brings us convenience and more opportunities which change our life fundamentally 


Reason 2: It has give all human beings access to information and strengthened global communication, accelerate societal progress.


concession：But it also cause many problems which pose threats to human society


Conclusion:people should make good use of the internet towards a better future.

subject: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
Main position:I agree that the internet outweigh the risks

Reason1:The internet provides a great convenience to our daily life.For example,the electronic payment like wechat pay has lightens our burden,we can complete the payment without cash.And we don’t be afraid of somebody steal your cash.

Reason 2:The Internet made a global connection.We can chat and connect with the people from all over the world,like use X and facebook.Because this kind of communication is not face-to-face,so we can communicate boldly.

subject: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
Opinion: The benefits of advanced internet overweight its risks.

Reason 1: The advanced internet provide more convenient system for people from different places to talk with each other, which improve the relationship between people. In that case, we could get more harmonious society.(communication)

Reason 2: The advanced internet offers many information all around the world, which make people know everything they want without going out.(convenience)

Reason 3: We could enhance the protection to private information to solve the problem of cybercrime.

subject: Re: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
To a large extent that I disagree that the risks outweigh the benefits.

Reason 1: The internet has created a huge convenience and efficiency that improves human’s quality of life and access to services.
Eg.E-commerce,E-Banking,Telemedicine and E-Government

Reason 2: It has revolutionised communication and fostering global connectivity
Eg.Global Personal/Professional Networks(Zoom,google meeting etc)
Access to Information and Social Activism(provides a platform for citizen journalism and the rapid organization of social and political movements)

subject: Re: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
from my point of view, the development of internet is a double edged sword,and what we need to do is to use then properly.

firstly, of course,internet have brought countless of benefits to us:we can use search engines such as google to search any questions we have at any corner of the world;we can communicate with any people and get immediate replies through social media like Facebook.and even more, with the development with ai,we can solve many more complex problems in our daily life.

However,nothing will only brings benefits to us without brining any problem.we have to see that,internet also have many negative impacts. One of the biggest problem is misinformation. Since everyone can upload information onto the internet,many misinformation will come out after we search. What’s more , the internet have brought countless of entertainment,such as video games,which make students cannot focus on their study anymore.

As a result,we need to use internet properly.

subject: Re: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
Main position :agree
1. The technology is advanced and convenient enough to combat cybercrime.
The internet can do numerous tasks.
2. Information of protecting personal privacy can acquire from internet conveniently.
The benefits : can communicate with most of the people all over the world.

There are solutions to prohibit or prevent the risks. It is impossible for most of the people that live in developed cities not to use the internet.

subject: Re: Outlining and paragraph writing (section 38)
message:
The benefits outweigh the risks

Reason1: The risks can be avoided. For the privacy and cybercrime part , people can protect their personal information through changing passwords regularly and buying Antivirus Software.

Reason2: The benefits can’t be replaced.The Internet can connect people in other places more efficiently. For example, text messages sent in Hong Kong can be received by relatives in the United States at the same time.
